meanings.sent1: I love to grill weenies for a quick and tasty snack.
meanings.sent2: At the picnic, we roasted weenies over the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they ate weenies on sticks.
meanings.sent4: The smell of sizzling weenies filled the air at the barbecue.
meanings.sent5: The hot dog vendor sold weenies with mustard and ketchup.

meanings.sent1: Tommy is such a weenie, always afraid to try new things.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a weenie, stand up for yourself and speak your mind.
meanings.sent3: The weenie hesitated before jumping into the pool.
meanings.sent4: She called him a weenie for backing out of the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The weenie avoided confrontation at all costs.

meanings.sent1: I weenie that we will have a great time at the party.
meanings.sent2: Do you weenie that it will rain tomorrow?
meanings.sent3: I weenie we should take the scenic route for a change.
meanings.sent4: She weenied that the movie would be boring, but ended up loving it.
meanings.sent5: He weenies in ghosts and supernatural phenomena.
